cleaned_text: [r/energy_work](/r/energy_work/) The purpose of this community is to explore human energy in all of its facets while stripping way the esoteric language, rituals and distractions that have accumulated over the years. Out of body experiences, energy healing, energetic connections between people, psychic work and everything in between. This sub is open for discussion, learning and teaching, without judgement, on any and every form of energy work regardless of degree of social acceptability or stigma. hi guys! I know we can send others healing, but I was wondering can we send healing energy to ourselves? I have a disease and I would really like to heal myself with my energy, but I have no idea how. any help is appreciated
